title: Calories in Red Seedless Grapes
meta_description: Discover calories in red seedless grapes per 100 g, including carbs, sugars, fiber, and full nutrition breakdown for easy tracking.
assumptions: Fresh, raw red seedless grapes, typical variety like Flame or Crimson, washed and ready to eat.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by variety, ripeness, growing conditions, and storage; values are approximate. Check local produce for specifics.

quick_answer.text: 100 g of red seedless grapes provides ~69 kcal, mainly from natural sugars.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Add 1 tsp honey drizzle per 100 g
Frozen grapes (no added sugar) per 100 g

faqs.q: How many calories in 100 g red seedless grapes?
Are red seedless grapes high in sugar?
faqs.a: Yes, ~15.5 g natural sugars per 100 g, from fructose.

faqs.q: What is the fiber content in red seedless grapes?
faqs.a: Approximately 0.9 g dietary fiber per 100 g.

faqs.q: Do red seedless grapes have fat or protein?
faqs.a: Very low: 0.2 g fat and 0.7 g protein per 100 g.

faqs.q: How do calories compare in green vs red grapes?
faqs.a: Similar; both around 69 kcal per 100 g, with minor color-based variations.
